course.title: MAT 5317 Analysis of Categorical Data (3 units)
course.desc: Analysis of one-way and two-way tables of nominal date; multi-dimensional contingency tables, log-linear models; tests of symmetry, marginal homogeneity in square tables; incomplete tables; tables with ordered categories; fixed margins, logistic models with binary response; measures of association and agreement; biological applications. This course is equivalent to STAT 5602 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
